reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 33

bcl:section.bcl:text: The transfers to Toquaht Nation of the properties described below on August 12, 2020, are exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:
This regulation is retroactive to August 12, 2020, with effect on and after that date.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, s. 37 (2) and (3).]
